original_title: Walt Disney Treasures - Mickey Mouse in Black and White, Volume Two
overview: In this final volume, the homage to Mickey's early career is completed with these shorts. From 1928's The Barn Dance to his very last black-and-white short, 1935's Mickey's Kangaroo, his colorful antics in a black-and-white world propelled his stardom to that of a superstar.
title: Walt Disney Treasures - Mickey Mouse in Black and White, Volume Two
